H0.text: Who resigned in October 1983 after a scandal over his ‘lovechild’. Cecil Parkinson

H1.text: Who resigned in October 1983 after a scandal over his ‘lovechild’. Neil Hamilton

H2.text: Who resigned in October 1983 after a scandal over his ‘lovechild’. David Mellor

H3.text: Who resigned in October 1983 after a scandal over his ‘lovechild’. Lord Parkinson

A4.text: Parkinson was forced to resign on 14 October 1983, after the news of Sara Keays's pregnancy had become public knowledge.

A5.text: The child was born with severe cerebral palsy.
